name: Valentines Day
description: The player takes control of a delivery man delivering romantic presents to women. In each level, the DS's touch screen is filled with a grid of women with their preferences marked. The player must choose from the presents available on the right side of the screen in order to deliver as many appreciated presents as possible, while trying to avoid delivering unwanted presents. At the end of each level, the player is scored based on their performance.

shot.caption: Mission display screen - this displays before starting every level.
The player's goal is to deliver presents to customers by picking an item they like and dragging it to them. The player can discard unwanted presents.
Boxes let the player double the score of a present by wrapping it up before delivery.
